page.title: Company for Privacy, Security and Transparency on the Internet
page.description: We are a company who focused on privacy, transparency and security on the internet.

homepage.title: Set privacy, transparency and security first
homepage.description: Stop searching for excuses for not protecting your data

mission.description_part1: The goal of Slynite is to make the Internet better through privacy and security prioritized software. Also, the software is developed mostly open source, as we see transparency as an important point in today's world.
mission.description_part2: In the development and publication of our projects, a strict pipeline is worked through at the end to ensure our goals of security, privacy, and transparency are sustained.

core_values.description: Our projects are always developed from scratch with our main principles. Through the principles, our goals can never be missed.
